attributes.action: Stop flight deportations to the Caribbean of British residents
attributes.additional_details:
The Independent 
3rd Feb 2019

Dozens to be deported on charter flight to Jamaica after living in UK for decades
attributes.background: The U.K. Government gave assurances during the Windrush scandal that Commonwealth immigrants will be treated fairly and their right of abode will be respected. This must be extended to those who have lived here most of their lives and for whom deportation means returning to an unknown country.
